mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sittermember (sitter_id,cctv_agree,introduction,personality_check,license_check, activity_date, activity_time,residence1, residence2,residence3,pay,career) values(#{sitter_id}, #{cctv_agree},#{introduction}, #{personality_check},#{license_check},#{activity_date}, #{activity_time},#{residence1},#{residence2},#{residence3},#{pay},0)
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, m.name, m.image_path, m.starrate, TRUNC(trunc(months_between(sysdate,m.birthday))/12)+1 age from sittermember s inner join member m on s.sitter_id=m.id WHERE advertise='T' and permission='T' ORDER BY s.premium
SELECT s.*, m.name, m.image_path, m.starrate, TRUNC(trunc(months_between(sysdate,m.birthday))/12)+1 age from sittermember s inner join member m on s.sitter_id=m.id
SELECT s.*, m.name, m.image_path, m.starrate, m.gender, m.phone, TRUNC(trunc(months_between(sysdate,m.birthday))/12)+1 age from sittermember s inner join member m on s.sitter_id=m.id WHERE m.id=#{id}
